title: SET_MINIMAP_COMPONENT_POSITION
content:
0x3E882B23// SetMinimapComponentPosition
void SET_MINIMAP_COMPONENT_POSITION(char* name, char* alignX, char* alignY, float posX, float posY, float sizeX, float sizeY);Parameters:name: The name of the minimap component to override.alignX: Equivalent to the alignX field in frontend.xml.alignY: Equivalent to the alignY field in frontend.xml.posX: Equivalent to the posX field in frontend.xml.posY: Equivalent to the posY field in frontend.xml.sizeX: Equivalent to the sizeX field in frontend.xml.sizeY: Equivalent to the sizeY field in frontend.xml.Overrides the minimap component data (from common:/data/ui/frontend.xml) for a specified component.
codeBlocks:
// SetMinimapComponentPosition
void SET_MINIMAP_COMPONENT_POSITION(char* name, char* alignX, char* alignY, float posX, float posY, float sizeX, float sizeY);
